[DQC.IFRS.0162.10084] The filer has used an invalid trading symbol of N/A. If a trading symbol is not applicable then use the no trading symbol flag element 'dei:NoTradingSymbolFlag'. The trading symbol cannot contain special characters such as %, $, !, ^, *, ", @, #, & or Invalid Tickers such as N/A, NOT APPLICABLE, NONE, n/a, - . In addition tickers should be entered in upper-case. If the ticker is a preferred security the element Security12bTitle should be tagged to indicate that it is a preferred security.
